title: Create a 30-60-90 Day Onboarding Plan
description: A hiring manager wants HR's help to create a structured 30-60-90 day plan for their new hire.

tasks.description: Provide the manager with a standard 30-60-90 day plan template.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP sends the manager the template document.

tasks.description: Consult with the manager to customize the template with role-specific goals and milestones.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP and manager work together to define key objectives for the new hire's first 90 days.

tasks.description: Upload the completed plan to the new hire's profile in the performance management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: HRBP saves the final plan to the employee's record for future reference.
